hero.readyToInnovate: Ready to Innovate, Create and Improve
hero.name: Luis Molina
hero.description: Enhancing digital experiences that are smooth, scalable and impactful.

about.title: About Me
about.description1: Hi, I'm {{name}}, passionate about building smart and scalable web and mobile applications. I have completed full-stack development courses and worked on web development projects, constantly exploring new technologies to refine my skills.
about.description2: I'm focused on continuous learning; my goal is to create innovative solutions and apply AI and data science to improve user experience and make life easier.

totalProjects.label: Total Projects
totalProjects.description: Innovative web and mobile solutions created

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: Explore my journey through projects, certifications and technical experience. Each section represents a milestone on my path of continuous learning.

iarecruitment.title: AI Recruitment App
iarecruitment.description: AI-driven recruitment platform built with Express.js and Next.js for intelligent candidate analysis and recommendations.

baccbeauty.title: BaccBeauty
baccbeauty.description: Professional website for a cosmetics brand present in 5 countries (Venezuela, Colombia, El Salvador, Guatemala and Peru), built with WordPress and Elementor, showcasing services and portfolio.

coorslightpty.title: Coors Light Panama
coorslightpty.description: Brand website for Coors Light in Panama, developed using Drupal with a modern design.

minestle.title: My Nestlé
minestle.description: Website development in Drupal. Articles and downloadable materials section filtered by country, brands section, recipes, promotions, podcast section by seasons and episodes.

nescafe.title: Nescafé - Guatemala
nescafe.description: Brand website for Nescafé developed with PHP, featuring a modern design and product showcase.

nestleagusta.title: Nestlé Anchor
nestleagusta.description: Section of the Nestlé brand website created using PHP, promoting healthy living and products.

crystodolar.title: CrystoDólar
crystodolar.description: Real-time exchange-rate tracker for the Venezuelan Bolívar against USDT. Features a Python and FastAPI API that scrapes various exchange houses and Binance USDT P2P market, calculating individual averages for buy and sell prices.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.subtitle: Have a question? Send a message and I'll reply soon.
contact.formDescription: Have something to discuss? Send a message and let's talk.
contact.subject: Subject
